feed.title: Tag: commands | Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog

entry.title: 16 Really Useful Shell Commands
entry.content:
This is post is now quite old and the the information it contains may be out of date or innacurate.

If you find any errors or have any suggestions to update the information please let us know or create a pull request on GitHub

Check out this blog post by NuBlue, 16 Really Useful Shell Commands..

A good intro to some of the most commonly used shell commands with nice explanations, well done guys :)
